snippet: A judge gave the Internal Revenue Service until Aug. 10 to explain under oath how it lost emails that Republicans are seeking as part of their ongoing investigation.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Emmet G Sullivan gives Internal Revenue Service until Aug 10 to explain under oath how it lost emails that Republicans are seeking as part of their investigation into accusations agency targeted conservative groups.
lead_paragraph: A judge gave the Internal Revenue Service until Aug. 10 to explain under oath how it lost emails that Republicans are seeking as part of their ongoing investigation.

headline.main: Judge Gives I.R.S. a Month to Explain Lost Emails
headline.print_headline: Judge Gives I.R.S. a Month to Explain Lost Emails
